Title: Malicious code in @nativescript-community/ui-pulltorefresh (npm)
Description:
This package was compromised by the Shai-Hulud NPM worm.
The malicious payload steals tokens and credentials and publishes
them to GitHub before propogating itself to NPM packages the user owns.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 2.5.4 up to 2.5.7, version 2.5.4, version 2.5.5, version 2.5.6, version 2.5.7
Solution: Unfortunately, there is no solution available yet.
